Package gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.entities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity
    Represents a gobblin Record in the Hive avro to orc conversion flow.
    QueryBasedHivePublishEntity
    Entity to carry Hive queries to publish table and partitions from writer to publisher.
    SchemaAwareHivePartition
    An extension to the Partition class that also knows the Schema of this Partition
    SchemaAwareHiveTable
    An extension to the Table that also knows the Schema of this Table
